remarks: A deduction version of ~ riota2f .  (Contributed by NM, 17-Feb-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2016.)
statement:
riota2df.1 $e |- F/ x ph $.
riota2df.2 $e |- ( ph -> F/_ x B ) $.
riota2df.3 $e |- ( ph -> F/ x ch ) $.
riota2df.4 $e |- ( ph -> B e. A ) $.
riota2df.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = B ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
riota2df $p |- ( ( ph /\ E! x e. A ps ) -> ( ch <-> ( iota_ x e. A ps ) = B ) ) $.
$d A x $.
